primary_issue_description: The user was unable to receive Authenticator approvals after changing to a new phone and required assistance setting up the Microsoft Authenticator app again.
resolution_provided: The bot guided the user through setting up their new phone for Microsoft Authenticator, including navigating security settings, selecting options to set up a new authentication method, and scanning a QR code.
additional_notes: The user initially had issues accessing the first link provided by the bot; however, the bot effectively addressed this by providing alternate links and clarifying them. The user was highly satisfied with the resolution.
